title: (x) Wallpaper mag July 2001 - Burin Sans {Stephen}
content:
Hey guys,   
   
At the risk of exposing my typographic ingnorance, I'd like to find out what this typeface is called. It appeared in Wallpaper's design directory of July 2001.   
   
Thanks!!   
 ![Unit Trust](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121165404im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39483.gif)

 [‹ (x) Classic script-like serif face - Raphael {Nicolai}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121165404/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5393 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Timberland Community Builders identity - Brazos WBW {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121165404/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5383 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Superfamous

comments.content:
Hey Folkert. Wallpaper has often used [Burin Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121165404/http:/typographi.com/000490.php) which I believe   
is based on oldschool speedball lettering forms.
Eric Olson's [Bryant](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121165404/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryant/index.html), btw, is also based on that aesthetic.
